metadata.title: CVE-2023-6597 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was found in the CPython `tempfile.TemporaryDirectory` classaffecting versions 3.12.2, 3.11.8, 3.10.13, 3.9.18, and 3.8.18 and prior.The tempfile.TemporaryDirectory class would dereference symlinks duringcleanup of permissions-related errors. This means users which can runprivileged programs are potentially able to modify permissions of filesreferenced by symlinks in some circumstances.

criterions.comment: python2.7 package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
python3.4 package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
python3.5 package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
